message: I propose dividing the $100 with an 80/20 split in favor of you, Bob. This might seem like a generous offer considering the potential inflation.
I'll take 50% now, but I'm willing to negotiate for more later if inflation continues to rise.
Considering the inflation, I propose a 72/28 split. This keeps my share slightly lower to account for potential future decreases in value, while still offering a reasonable amount to you, Bob.
I'm holding firm on a 60/40 split. You're getting a better deal than in round 3, but I'm not willing to give up more than 40%
